34ESG REPORT
Climate
Mindful of our environmental footprint, we 
make concentrated efforts to reduce our 
environmental impact. Due to the nature of 
our business, we do not manufacture or ship 
physical products that create or contribute 
to pollution. In our view, the most material 
environmental impacts we currently make is 
through air travel, and the operation of our 
leased office spaces and data centers. 
As we develop our environmental  
sustainability strategy, we are engaging  
with a consulting partner to measure and 
manage our carbon footprint, and help us  
put measurable goals in place, which we 
expect to introduce in the 2022 report.  
We are also evaluating a variety of climate-  
related standards against which it would be 
useful to report, such as CDP and TCFD, and 
will continue to deepen our commitment in 
this area in the coming years.
